trends: There has been one other sighting in Kyoto
There were no other sightings in Kyoto on or around March 11th 2008
This sighting has been favorited 1 time.
Summary: It never moved, not an inch, and had a cloud texture with something colorful in one of the top sides(right side), but very fade.
divs: sighting detailsi was vacationing in japan. on march 11 2008 at 9:05 a.m., i saw, in a sunny morning over kyoto north, japan, something in the sky. it never moved, not an inch, and had a cloud texture with something colorful in one of the top sides(right side), but very fade. the first impression i had, is that it was the moon. and why is that ?... because of the contrast the moon makes when it's blue sky. there were some people around, but i was the first to see it and told the others. i observed the object for 5-10 minutes maximum, and 20-30 minutes after, i observed it again in another angle (not much different from the first) for 1 minute maximum, but with nothing different from the first sight. in all the time the object didn't moved, it was absolute still. there was nothing in the area flying. the sky was all clear. an hour later i think it was gone. i never saw it moved or disappear. i used a cybershot t-10 with 7.2 megapixels. more detailed information in : http:\\www.ufocasebook.com\2008b\kyotojapan.html thank you
